channel.title: Limits on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Limits on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: New releases for GitHub Actions â€“ November 2025
item.description:
GitHub increased limits for reusable workflows in GitHub Actions (November 2025): workflows can now nest up to 10 reusable workflows and a single workflow run can call up to 50 workflows in total.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Firewall Updates - IP Group limit increased to 600 per Firewall Policy
item.description:
Azure Firewall Policy now generally available supports up to 600 IP Groups per policy (previously 200), allowing administrators to simplify and better organize firewall rules by using more IP Groups instead of long IP lists.

  • Source: Azure Updates
